sentences.sentence: Many of the earliest known images of Hindu deities in India date from the time of the Kushan empire, fashioned either from the spotted sandstone of Mathura or Gandharan grey schist.
sentences.translation: 在印度，许多已知最早的印度教神像都可以追溯到 Kushan 帝国时期，这些神像是用马图拉的斑点砂岩或 Gandharan 的灰色片岩建造的。

sentences.sentence: The quartz-mica schist together with paragneiss constituted the old supracrustal series.
sentences.translation: 长石石英云母片岩与副片麻岩一起构成了古老的表壳结构。

sentences.sentence: The pre-exist amphibolite facies rocks in the fracture belt have been superimposed by retrograde green-schist facies with neoformation of chlorite.
sentences.translation: 断裂带中已存在的角闪岩相岩石已与绿泥石新形成的逆行绿片岩相叠加。
